attr.title: HitStunFly
attr.desc: HitStunFly is a fast paced indie platform fighting game inspired by Smash and Rivals of Aether. Enjoy local multiplayer 1v1 battles with 6 unique characters, 4 stages, and dynamic gameplay mechanics including directional influence (DI) on moves and fast falling.
attr.inst: To download and play 'HitStunFly', visit https://fortythreesam.itch.io/hitstunfly, download the '.pck' file, rename it to 'game.pck', move it to the 'gamedata' folder in your game directory, and launch the game.
